0.0.6.en: Refactor backend, fixed onoff, dim, sensor so they all follow the same pattern. New rules to use.

0.0.8.en: FIxed some bugs and tweaked some settings

0.1.0.en: This is the first officiall beta release for production.

0.1.2.en: Added so you can change Floor Plan under Edit Floor plan in settings

0.1.3.en: Changed how we store Floorplan images, Added support for Measure, Change so when you add device on search you can just carry on untill you are done. Loads of other stuff.

0.1.4.en: Fixed double rules and changed default colors

0.1.5.en: Changed how floor plan images are saved. Using Userdata instead. Also fixed some other stuff.

0.1.7.en: Fixed temperature display, fixed Select Icon in Settings, Fixed a debounce on pressing
